body:
Pared this down to run only 36 times. Takes about 5 to 10 minutes. These runs come from some manual examination of what situations caused the most stalls. Would be good to get this running automatically.

Highlight (or rather, a lowlight): BM_PumpUnbalancedUnary_Trickle/64M/32M/64M has one client transport stall and one server transport stall per iteration.

Sample run from my corp Linux desktop:

```
BM_PumpUnbalancedUnary_Trickle/64/1024k/256k     34999652 ns    2449381 ns        100   408.291MB/s writes/iter:114.31 cli_transport_stalls/iter:0 cli_stream_stalls/iter:0 svr_transport_stalls/iter:0 svr_stream_stalls/iter:0
```
